page.title: 19THE BETHANY FELLOWSHIP
page.content: The Bethany Fellowship is a group of Christians.They have daily worship every morning and almost every night.They have most meetings in Roffey Place and some in the Hyde.We meet on a Sunday at Roffey Place.At Christmas,sometimes we have dinner there.About 10-12 people live in the Hyde.The Hyde itself was built in the 17th century.The Warren family have loaned it to the Fellowship for 10 years.They have 1000 acres.They have lovely gardens and 3 lakes.Every 3 weeks groups of people come and stay at the Hyde.They are called leaders. Roffey Place is a Christian College where young single people and families come and learn more about God.There are 4 main preachers and a few other partime ones.In the Summer we go to a Christian Camp at Newark showground. About 2000-3000 people attend.
